inclusion.criterion: Referred for a clinically ordered right and left heart catheterization
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: cardiac cath with right heart cath

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to comply with all requirements of the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Retinal or optic nerve problems or unexplained visual disturbance
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Alpha antagonists or cytochrome P450 3A4 inhibitors use within 24 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or recent (≤ 30 days) acute coronary syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: cardiac cath with right heart cath

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis and underwent cardiac catheterization, but there is no mention of nitrate use within 24 hours or SBP < 110 mmHg or MAP < 75 mmHg.
